thread.title: Franck Ribery humiliated in Bayern Munich training after Rafinha delivers devastating nutmeg
thread.title_full: Franck Ribery humiliated in Bayern Munich training after Rafinha delivers devastating nutmeg

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Franck Ribery humiliated in Bayern Munich training after Rafinha delivers devastating nutmeg
text:
Franck Ribery humiliated in Bayern Munich training after Rafinha delivers devastating nutmeg The Frenchman probably wishes he came out of international retirement now Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Rafinha ruins Ribery with nutmeg in Bayern training Share this video Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
If Franck Ribery thought he was going to have a relatively quiet couple of weeks with the international break going on, he thought wrong. 
The Frenchman retired from international duty three years ago after a back injury ruled him out of the 2014 World Cup. 
The Bayern Munich winger considered dusting off his international boots for last year's Euros, but the plan never came into fruition. 
So retired he stayed. 
But the 33-year-old will wish he had come out retirement after being the victim of a brutal nutmeg on Tuesday. Ribery will feel hollow after this (Photo: FC Bayern Munich) 
In Munich training the stars were playing their favourite game - El Rondo. 
Ribery somehow found himself as the piggy in the middle, and he was soon made to pay. Rushing in to challenge Brazil's Rafinha, the Frenchman was rewarded with a delicious nutmeg. Ribery took it in good jest (Photo: FC Bayern Munich) 
The right back delicately rolled the ball through his opponent's legs sending his teammates spare. 
Good job Ribery took it in good fun. Like us on Facebook
